SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.controller

Class BaseViewController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.controller.BaseViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskEventObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DistributionViewController, EditTaskViewController, InsightsViewController, NewTaskViewController, SettingsViewController, TasksViewController
public abstract class BaseViewController extends Object implements TaskEventObserver

Base controller class for views that need to observe task events.

This class implements the TaskEventObserver interface and provides a base implementation for handling task events.

Since:
V1.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen
See Also:
